title: get_manifest_by_id_response_body
description: A get manifest by id response body

allOf.title: manifest
allOf.description:
Used for combining packages into one scannable form that a carrier can use when picking up a large 
number of shipments

allOf.title: se_id
allOf.description: A string that uniquely identifies a ShipEngine resource, such as a carrier, label, shipment, etc.

ship_date.description: The date-time that the manifests shipments will be picked up

shipments.description: The number of shipments that are included in this manifest
